title: Welcome to Millhaven
description: The town crier has asked you to introduce yourself to the important people of Millhaven.

objectives.description: Speak with Mayor Thornfield at the Town Hall
Visit Goran at the Blacksmith Shop
Meet Mary at the Wanderer's Rest Inn

completion_text: Welcome to Millhaven! The townspeople are glad to have a new adventurer among them.

title: First Delivery
description: Tom the shopkeeper needs someone to deliver a package to the blacksmith.

objectives.description: Pick up the package from Tom's General Store
Deliver the package to Goran the Blacksmith

completion_text: Excellent work! Goran was pleased to receive his order on time.

title: The Rat Problem
description: The inn's basement has been overrun with giant rats. Mary needs someone to clear them out.

objectives.description: Eliminate 5 giant rats in the inn's basement
Report back to Mary when the task is complete

completion_text: Thank you so much! The inn is safe once again. Please, take these as a token of my gratitude.

title: Goblin Scouts
description: Goblin scouts have been spotted near the town. The mayor wants them dealt with before they report back to their tribe.

objectives.description: Collect goblin ears as proof of your success

completion_text: Excellent work, adventurer! With these scouts eliminated, Millhaven is safe for now.
